trans-unit.source: Contains a list of possible states for the audio input to a speech recognition engine.
trans-unit.target: 音声認識エンジンにオーディオの入力の可能な状態の一覧が含まれています。

trans-unit.source: You can obtain the audio input state of the speech recognition engine with the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.AudioState%2A?displayProperty=fullName> and <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.AudioState%2A?displayProperty=fullName> properties.
trans-unit.target: 音声認識エンジンでのオーディオ入力の状態を取得することができます、<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.AudioState%2A?displayProperty=fullName>と<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.AudioState%2A?displayProperty=fullName>プロパティ</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.AudioState%2A?displayProperty=fullName></xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.AudioState%2A?displayProperty=fullName>。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.AudioStateChanged?displayProperty=fullName> and <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.AudioStateChanged?displayProperty=fullName> events are raised when the audio input state of a speech recognition engine changes.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.AudioStateChanged?displayProperty=fullName>と<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.AudioStateChanged?displayProperty=fullName>オーディオ入力、音声認識エンジンが変更の状態とイベントが発生します</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.AudioStateChanged?displayProperty=fullName></xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.AudioStateChanged?displayProperty=fullName>。

trans-unit.source: Receiving silence or non-speech background noise.
trans-unit.target: サイレント状態または以外の音声のバック グラウンド ノイズを受信しています。
音声入力を受信しています。
オーディオ入力を処理できません。
